Summary: At that time weather is affected by dark yellow shining .
trends: There has been one other sighting in Baraut
There was one other sighting in Baraut on or around July 19th 2013
divs: Sighting DetailsAt that time (+5:30 GMT ,time approximate-7 pm) we are walking in our home roof .Before some time weather condition very clear, suddenly weather change as it reflect yellow light by any object that time i take a picture by tablet and feel about it. by suddenly changing the weather condition by an object. I think about it as UFO. It move to east to north direction very fast with back weather changes and effects by dark yellow light.
